001package net.tvburger.jdl.datasets;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Floats;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
005
006public class LogicalDataSets {
007
008    private LogicalDataSets() {
009    }
010
011    public static DataSet toMinusSet(DataSet dataSet) {
012        for (DataSet.Sample sample : dataSet) {
013            for (int i = 0; i < sample.featureCount(); i++) {
014                if (Floats.equals(sample.features()[i], 0.0f)) {
015                    sample.features()[i] = -1.0f;
016                }
017            }
018            for (int i = 0; i < sample.targetCount(); i++) {
019                if (Floats.equals(sample.targetOutputs()[i], 0.0f)) {
020                    sample.targetOutputs()[i] = -1.0f;
021                }
022            }
023        }
024        return dataSet;
025    }
026
027    public static DataSet.Loader or() {
028        return () -> DataSet.of(
029                DataSet.Sample.of(Floats.of(0.0f, 0.0f), Floats.of(0.0f)),
030                DataSet.Sample.of(Floats.of(0.0f, 1.0f), Floats.of(1.0f)),
031                DataSet.Sample.of(Floats.of(1.0f, 0.0f), Floats.of(1.0f)),
032                DataSet.Sample.of(Floats.of(1.0f, 1.0f), Floats.of(1.0f)));
033    }
034
035    public static DataSet.Loader and() {
036        return () -> DataSet.of(
037                DataSet.Sample.of(Floats.of(0.0f, 0.0f), Floats.of(0.0f)),
038                DataSet.Sample.of(Floats.of(0.0f, 1.0f), Floats.of(0.0f)),
039                DataSet.Sample.of(Floats.of(1.0f, 0.0f), Floats.of(0.0f)),
040                DataSet.Sample.of(Floats.of(1.0f, 1.0f), Floats.of(1.0f)));
041    }
042
043    public static DataSet.Loader xor() {
044        return () -> DataSet.of(
045                DataSet.Sample.of(Floats.of(0.0f, 0.0f), Floats.of(0.0f)),
046                DataSet.Sample.of(Floats.of(0.0f, 1.0f), Floats.of(1.0f)),
047                DataSet.Sample.of(Floats.of(1.0f, 0.0f), Floats.of(1.0f)),
048                DataSet.Sample.of(Floats.of(1.0f, 1.0f), Floats.of(0.0f)));
049    }
050
051}
